entities.description: Standard Error of the total, calculated using different statistical software.
Gender indicator where values 0, 1, and 2 correspond to the U.S. Census Bureau population estimates.
A sum used in the calculation of standard error in SUDAAN procedure.
The mean used in the calculation of standard error in SUDAAN procedure.
Standard deviation used in calculations related to SAS procedure.
An output calculation used in the Stata procedure for calculating standard errors.
Sum of weights used in SAS calculations relevant to standard error.
Standard Error for specific demographic groups in SAS procedure.

relationships.description: The SE of totals is calculated based on gender defined by U.S. Census Bureau population estimates.
SUDAAN uses the sum in the calculation of the standard error.
SUDAAN uses the mean in the calculation of the standard error.
SAS uses the standard deviation in its calculations.
Stata procedure generates SE total calculations.
SAS calculates the standard error for overall estimates.
